short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Draft Airbnb reply with AI for free, made by Daxzy.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
DaxzyGPT is a free Chrome extension designed for Airbnb hosts. With just one click, seamlessly connect from Airbnb to ChatGPT and effortlessly draft messages using AI.

Key Features:
• One-Click AI Integration: Instantly transfer your Airbnb conversation to ChatGPT, Claude, or Perplexity with a single click.
• Smart Prompt Generation: Automatically constructs relevant prompts based on your Airbnb conversation context.
• Time-Saving: Quickly generate professional and personalized responses to guest inquiries.
• Easy Copy-Paste: Effortlessly transfer AI-generated responses back to your Airbnb conversation.

Perfect for:
• Airbnb Hosts and Co-hosts
• Property Managers
• Short-Term Rental Operators

Note: DaxzyGPT requires you to be logged into your preferred AI tool (ChatGPT, Claude, or Perplexity) for seamless functionality.

Boost your Airbnb hosting efficiency with DaxzyGPT - your AI-powered communication assistant!

Developed by Daxzy Enterprise Inc., trusted by 100+ hosts for effortless short-term rental management.

Visit https://www.daxzy.com/ or email info@daxzy.com to learn more about our Airbnb management services, virtual assistant training, and courses on building and scaling your Airbnb business.
